description:
ERODE A CIFTI FILE.

For all data values that are empty (for label data, unlabeled, for other data, zero), set the surrounding values to empty.  The surrounding values are defined as the immediate neighbors and all values in the same structure within the specified distance (-merged-volume treats all voxels as one structure).

The -*-corrected-areas options are intended for eroding on group average surfaces, but it is only an approximate correction.

area-metric.description:
vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the left surface

the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

anyOf.description: specify the left surface to use

left-surface.description: specify the left surface to use

area-metric.description:
vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the right surface

the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

anyOf.description: specify the right surface to use

right-surface.description: specify the right surface to use

area-metric.description:
vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the cerebellum surface

the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

anyOf.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

cerebellum-surface.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

merged-volume.description: treat volume components as if they were a single component

direction.description: which dimension to dilate along, ROW or COLUMN

surface-distance.description: the distance to dilate on surfaces, in mm

volume-distance.description: the distance to dilate in the volume, in mm
